content:
The tool appears to support FHIR R4 but the version given is v4.0.0. The published version of FHIR R4 is 4.0.1. Does Crucible support 4.0.1 or the errata version that is now archived 4.0.0.

Thank you,

Doug DeShazo

Looking at the gem dependencies in GitHub, it appears that Crucible supports FHIR 4.0.0. That repository and website are only periodically maintained and there is no currently scheduled update that I am aware of.

In the interim, if you want to test FHIR R4 4.0.1, then you should consider using Inferno or Touchstone.
